typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Arr as string[] (split(toString(Volum),';'))
}
source(output(
		Trafikkregistreringspunkt as string,
		Navn as string,
		Vegreferanse as string,
		Fra as date,
		Til as string,
		{År} as short,
		{Måned} as short,
		Volum as short,
		{Konfidensintervall start} as short,
		{Konfidensintervall slutt} as short,
		{Dekningsgrad (%)} as string,
		{Antall døgn total} as short,
		{Antall døgn inkludert} as short,
		{Antall døgn ugyldig} as boolean,
		{Ikke gyldig lengde} as short,
		{Lengdekvalitetsgrad (%)} as string,
		Felt as string,
		{< 5,6m} as string,
		{>= 5,6m} as string,
		{5,6m - 7,6m} as string,
		{7,6m - 12,5m} as string,
		{12,5m - 16,0m} as string,
		{16,0m - 24,0m} as string,
		{>= 24,0m} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SVV-sykkeldata.csv']) ~> source1
source1 filter(Felt == "Totalt") ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'SVV_Sykkeldata',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Trafikkregistreringspunkt,
		Navn,
		Dato = Fra,
		Volum
	)) ~> sink1
